title: date balls
ingredients: 1/2 Cup peanut butter; from the fridge preferably
1 Cup shredded coconut; plus more for rolling
instructions: Blend everything in a food processor until smooth enough that there are no large chunks of date.
Optionally, wet hands very lightly and shape into 10â€“12 heaping tablespoon-sized balls.
Store in the fridge or freezer.
